name: Catty Shack 2
description:
Catty Shack 2

The ghost's cat shelter has seen some improvements. These improvements have not stopped all the cats from running away again. Good news, though: there are only four kitties to find this time. 

Arrow keys or swipe to move and interact. 

The sequel to Catty Shack: http://eandegames.com/games/catty-shack/

Made with Bitsy: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy (and the following hacks directional avatar, end-from-dialogue, exit-from-dialogue, favicon-from-sprite,  transparent-sprites, and background-music)
